message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1,400,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $1,100,000 is a bit lower than I hoped for, I understand your perspective.  Could we meet in the middle at $1,250,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $1,250,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,200,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Can you consider this offer?
